record.id: field.name="model.number" and file.name="cm3rcatphase" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: model.number
record.file.name: cm3rcatphase

brief.brief: The unique ID of the existing Change record to use as a template.
This is the number of the Request that Service Manager uses as a Model for every Request it opens under this Phase.

detail.detail: Service Manager validates this field during Phase Validations.

The item you specify as the Model must exist as a Change request in the cm3r database. If it does not, Service Manager issues the message: "Request number <number> cannot be used as a Model", and returns you to the Model View of the Phase record.
